abstract: British retailer Tesco reports upswing in latest quarter, with price cuts and better service contributing to turnaround; sales at British shops open for more than 12 months dropped 1.3 percent in fiscal first quarter, smaller fall than anticipated by analysts.
lead_paragraph: Price cuts and better service helped Tesco win back shoppers in its latest quarter, Britain’s biggest retailer said on Friday.

headline.main: Improved Service and Price Cuts Lure Tesco Shoppers
headline.print_headline: Improved Service and Price Cuts Lure Tesco Shoppers

snippet: Price cuts and better service helped Tesco win back shoppers in its latest quarter, Britain’s biggest retailer said on Friday.
